attributes.action: Ban all knives to prevent more knife crimes 2023
attributes.additional_details: The Statistics of Knife Crime has risen over the months and we need a stop to this. People are losing family members and friends due to this and no one feels safe walking around the streets just because of these situations.
attributes.background: We want you guys to ban knives that could be used to harm or murder people around the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Ban sale of all sharply pointed kitchen knives:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641031
